messages.text:
LGTM

mike says:

It looks good.


Two comments;

In hash_map.h, I'd put short comments on the new fields. In
hash_map.c, I'd put comments on the places where youset last_hash to
~(uintptr_t)0, and decrement it->changes,saying  /* force further
iterations to terminate in "recompute" path above */

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

spec change looks fine
mike should do the code review. i'll loop him in.
